std::exception_ptr nested_ptr() const noexcept;
}}

Returns a pointer to the stored exception, if any.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A {{tt|std::exception_ptr}} to the stored exception if one is stored, default-initialized {{tt|std::exception_ptr}} otherwise.
